headline: Chris Turner To Become CEO Of Yum! Brands (NYSE:YUM) In October 2025
summary: Yum! Brands (NYSE:YUM) recently announced a significant executive change with Chris Turner being named as the next CEO, effective October 1, 2025, succeeding David Gibbs who retires after a notable tenure. During this announcement period, the company's share price remained flat alongside the broader market, reflecting a generally calm investor response amidst a backdrop of fluctuating global markets due to geopolitical tensions and rising oil prices. The CEO transition plan, emphasizing...

headline: KFC Owner Yum Brands Selects Finance Chief as Next CEO
summary: Yum Brands  named Chief Financial Officer  Chris Turner  as its next chief executive.  Turner will start on Oct. 1, about six years after joining the operator of KFC, Taco Bell and Pizza Hut.  Turner, who had his first date with his wife at a Pizza Hut, said he would push forward with Yum’s restaurant growth and technological services developed to aid its franchisees.

raw.headline: KFC Owner Yum Brands Selects Finance Chief as Next CEO

Turner will start on Oct. 1, about six years after joining the operator of KFC, Taco Bell and Pizza Hut.  Turner, who had his first date with his wife at a Pizza Hut, said he would push forward with Yum’s restaurant growth and technological services developed to aid its franchisees.

headline: KFC parent Yum Brands' finance chief Chris Turner to take over as CEO
summary: The company had said in March Gibbs would retire in 2026 after about 37 years at the KFC and Taco Bell parent, during which he assumed several roles and became its top boss in 2020.  Gibbs will remain at Yum Brands in an advisory capacity until the end of next year, the company said on Tuesday.  The company's Taco Bell banner has bucked broader weakness in the restaurant industry for the past several quarters, helped by its value meals and the appeal of its Tex-Mex cuisine.

headline: Yum! Brands Appoints Chris Turner as Chief Executive Officer Effective October 1, 2025
summary: LOUISVILLE, Ky., June 17, 2025--Yum! Brands, Inc. (NYSE: YUM) today announced that its Board of Directors has unanimously elected Chris Turner, 50, as Chief Executive Officer, effective October 1, 2025.
